page.title: 02THE LOCAL NEWSPAPER
page.content: The Editor of the{Hampshire {Chronicle, Mr.Robinson, comes to work at 8.15 . Seventy people work for him at the Hampshire Chronicle.If something happened at night he would stay up and write about it.They have been interviewed on television about the paper.The paper is 200 years old .The staff and himself get a copy of the paper free every week.The paper is delivered by van to the shops.The company owns one printer machine but it is in three units.Five tons of paper is used.There are 300 stories and 70 photos in the paper a week.They do not have any games in the paper because they do not approve of it.They also do not give away free samples of things .2400 papers are sold a year.
